articles.author: By  REUTERS
articles.title: Qataris search for bodies of Americans killed by Islamic State in Syria ahead of Trump visit - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: While the sources did tell Reuters whose remains the Qataris were searching for, it is believed that the bodies of two journalists and one aid worker are being recovered.
articles.content: A Qatari mission has begun searching for the remains of US hostages killed by Islamic State in Syria a decade ago, two sources briefed on the mission said, reviving a longstanding effort to recover t… [+3766 chars]
